src_original: saddharmaṃ ca tvayā grāhyaṃ guhyaṃ triyānikam //  etat padmakule śuddhe saṃvaraṃ samayocyate //
saṃvaraṃ sarvasaṃyuktaṃ parigṛhṇīṣva tattvataḥ //  pūjākarma yathāśaktyā mahākarmakuloccaye //
na tyājyaṃ na ca kṣeptavyaṃ mūlāpattir iti smṛtam //  tridive ca trirātrau ca vartitavyaṃ dine dine //  yadā hānir bhaved yogī sthūlāpattyo bhaviṣyati //
prāṇinaś ca na te ghātyā adattaṃ naiva cāharet //  nācaret kāmamithyāyāṃ mṛṣā naiva ca bhāṣayet //
akriyāṃ varjayet sarvāṃ sattvārthaṃ vinayena ca //  sādhūnām upatiṣṭheta yogināṃ paryupāsanam //
trividhaṃ kāyikaṃ karma vacasā ca caturvidham //
